name: Blinded
summary: You can't see and automatically fail checks that require sight; attack rolls against you have advantage, your attack rolls have disadvantage.

name: Charmed
summary: You can't attack the charmer or target them with harmful abilities; charmer has advantage on social ability checks to interact with you.

name: Deafened
summary: You can't hear and automatically fail checks that require hearing.

name: Frightened
summary: Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls while the source of fear is in sight; you can't willingly move closer to the source.

name: Grappled
summary: Speed becomes 0; ends if grappler is incapacitated or you are moved out of reach/effect.

name: Incapacitated
summary: You can't take actions or reactions.

name: Invisible
summary: You are unseen; attack rolls against you have disadvantage, your attacks have advantage against sight-reliant targets.

name: Paralyzed
summary: Incapacitated and can't move or speak; auto-fail Str/Dex saves; attacks against you have advantage; hits within 5 ft are critical if they hit.

name: Poisoned
summary: Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

name: Prone
summary: You can crawl; disadvantage on attack rolls; attacks within 5 ft against you have advantage, others have disadvantage.

name: Restrained
summary: Speed 0; attack rolls against you have advantage; your attacks have disadvantage; Dex saves with disadvantage.

name: Stunned
summary: Incapacitated, can't move; can speak only falteringly; auto-fail Str/Dex saves; attack rolls against you have advantage.

name: Unconscious
summary: Incapacitated, drop what you're holding, fall prone; auto-fail Str/Dex saves; attacks against you have advantage, melee hits are critical if within 5 ft.
